headline: Rep. Jim Jordan Explains How Media Keeps Changing Relevance of Hunter Biden Laptop Story
sentences: And now we find out these text messages and e-mails that link the entire family — not just Hunter and Joe, but also uncle, Joe's brother James Biden is involved in this as well."
So two 8-page long stories, four minutes apart, from the news organization that said 18 months ago there was no story here, this was Russian disinformation.
And now, finally, it is, 'Well, Joe had something to do with it, but he really didn’t do anything wrong.'

EXCERPT:
JORDAN: "I mean, you mentioned those two stories from 'The Washington Post' ten days ago.
In fact, that’s what his Chief of Staff Ron Klain told us last Sunday on the Sunday shows.
Now it’s, 'No, it wasn’t Russian disinformation, but Joe had nothing to do with it.'
I think it’s interesting too, Maria, how this story has evolved, how it has changed.
Then it was, 'Well, it was his laptop, but it was Russian disinformation.'
Remember, it started off as, 'Oh, it wasn’t his laptop.'
You don’t see 'The Washington Post' do that.
My, how this story has change changed.
One was at 11:00, one was at 11:04.
That tells you something is up.
